transcripts.text: There is a time for peace and a time for war.  Which time are we?  In 2020, America is... Talking.  Black lives matter.  Blue lives matter.  Cops are bastards.  Law and order.  Police violence.  Law violence.  I can't breathe.  Color revolution.

The rubber bullets flying.  The anarchist fires roaring.  The weeping.  People did this for no reason.  Grieving parents.  Business owners.  Bystanders.  As we shout, you speak.  But we do not listen.  Can we?  Should we?  The tongue is a fire, a world of unrighteousness, setting on fire the entire course of life, and set on fire by hell.  Erase the images.  Ignore the demands of propaganda.  Listen to the shop owner, the gangbanger, the cop, the activist, the expert, the journalist.  Or don't listen.  But... If you won't listen to their stories, who will listen to yours?
